ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.timing.v1alpha1.NTPClient.description: NTPClient is the Schema for the ntpclients API

spec.description: The NTP client allows for configuring NTP servers and the source of NTP traffic in order for the devices to synchronize their clocks.

router.description: Router used to reach the NTP servers.
router.title: Router

routerKind.description: the Kind of the router used to reach the NTP servers.
routerKind.title: Router Kind

routerSelector.description: Selects router resources based on the defined KIND.  Applies to DefaultRouter only. Not supported for Router and ManagementRouter.
routerSelector.title: Router Selector

servers.description: A list of NTP servers, each entry in the list can either be an IP address or an FQDN.

iBurst.description: Indicates whether this server should enable burst synchronization or not
iBurst.title: Enable iBurst

preferred.description: Indicates whether this server should be preferred or not
preferred.title: Preferred Server

server.description: An NTP server can either be an IP address or an FQDN
server.title: Server

servers.title: Servers

sourceInterface.description: Specifies a Interface resource to use as a source of NTP traffic. If none is specified the Node default behavior is used.
sourceInterface.title: Source Interface

sourceInterfaceKind.description: Specifies the source interface Kind to use as a source of NTP traffic.
sourceInterfaceKind.title: Source Interface Kind

spec.title: Specification

status.description: NTPClientStatus defines the observed state of NTPClient

health.description: Indicates the health score of the NTPClient
health.title: Health Score

healthScoreReason.description: Indicates the reason for the health score
healthScoreReason.title: Health Score Reason

lastChange.description: The time when the state of the resource last changed
lastChange.title: Last Change

nodes.description: List of nodes which are not synchronized
nodes.title: Unsynchronized Nodes

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.timing.v1alpha1.NTPClientL.description: NTPClientList is a list of ntpclients
